name: Weezing
flavorText:
Where two kinds
of poison gases
meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a
WEEZING over many
years.

pokemon.name: Koffing
pokemon.flavorText:
Because it stores
several kinds of
toxic gases in its body, it is
prone to exploding
without warning.
